reviews.text: We found this small place on our travels and decided to give it a try. We were not disappointed.  We ate inside but it seems the majority of business comes from takeout and delivery.  The pizza was absolutely delicious.  The staff were very personable and pleasant as well.  I definitely recommend trying Fat Daddio‚Äôs if you are in the area!
This place is solid! Customer service is always excellent and the pizzas are amazing! Plus, I love how they send me weekly coupons!!! If you haven‚Äôt tried it yet you‚Äôre missing out.

Today Tony Vanoy and I stopped at "Fat Daddo's Pizza in DeSota area of Sarasota off University Blvd.
It's a small place in a shopping strip area.
It was clean and staff friendly!
We ordered 1 slice each of Pepperoni Pizza and shared a 12oz can of Coca Cola...
Oh it was so good going down!

The Pizza was good and very large. I ate about 1/2 of mine my pouch was full.
I would recommend and they offer free parking! I hope you try them out.

Fat Daddios is the best pizza spot in Sarasota! My husband & I have ordered from here a few times and they‚Äôve been consistently on point.  The crust is perfectly cooked & their sauce is *chefs kiss*. The staff has also been very kind every time. Highly recommend!

I've only gotten delivery from Fat Daddios but it is fantastic, for starters the fried mushrooms are yummy, and they have a variety of salads to choose from and they don't skimp on the toppings, I usually get the steak and cheese and the bread Is great steak and the toppings are very good and for dessert I go for the cheesecake  .a dinner that doesn't break the bank like most 2 people can eat a good meal for 30 and some change.

editorial_summary.overview: Low-key, family-friendly Italian joint for baked pasta, traditional pies, sandwiches & stromboli.

recentReviews.author: Lisa Boyce
recentReviews.text:
Today Tony Vanoy and I stopped at "Fat Daddo's Pizza in DeSota area of Sarasota off University Blvd.
It's a small place in a shopping strip area.
It was clean and staff friendly!
We ordered 1 slice each of Pepperoni Pizza and shared a 12oz can of Coca Cola...
Oh it was so good going down!

The Pizza was good and very large. I ate about 1/2 of mine my pouch was full.
I would recommend and they offer free parking! I hope you try them out.

recentReviews.author: Stephaney Portell
recentReviews.text: I've only gotten delivery from Fat Daddios but it is fantastic, for starters the fried mushrooms are yummy, and they have a variety of salads to choose from and they don't skimp on the toppings, I usually get the steak and cheese and the bread Is great steak and the toppings are very good and for dessert I go for the cheesecake  .a dinner that doesn't break the bank like most 2 people can eat a good meal for 30 and some change.

recentReviews.author: Tony Pangaio
recentReviews.text: We found this small place on our travels and decided to give it a try. We were not disappointed.  We ate inside but it seems the majority of business comes from takeout and delivery.  The pizza was absolutely delicious.  The staff were very personable and pleasant as well.  I definitely recommend trying Fat Daddio‚Äôs if you are in the area!

recentReviews.author: Victoria Serra
recentReviews.text: Fat Daddios is the best pizza spot in Sarasota! My husband & I have ordered from here a few times and they‚Äôve been consistently on point.  The crust is perfectly cooked & their sauce is *chefs kiss*. The staff has also been very kind every time. Highly recommend!

recentReviews.author: Angela Tevenal
recentReviews.text: This place is solid! Customer service is always excellent and the pizzas are amazing! Plus, I love how they send me weekly coupons!!! If you haven‚Äôt tried it yet you‚Äôre missing out.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 5.0/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the consistently delicious pizza with perfectly cooked crust and sauce that is highly praised. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The excellent customer service and friendly staff are consistently highlighted by customers. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Weekly coupons sent to customers are appreciated and encourage repeat business. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
